title: Theater room, XL washer and dryer closets, Smart home package
posting_body: ['We are currently offering virtual tours.', 'Please use the link in this ad to visit our website and set up a tour today or give us a call!', 'Welcome to Lodge at Ames Pond', 'Call Now - (978) 965-3167 x 1', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 731 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Lodge at Ames Pond features stylish Tewksbury apartments and convenient on-site amenities.', "Now offering furnished and unfurnished apartments, you're sure to enjoy spacious master suites, large closets, and upgraded appliances and European-style cabinetry.", 'Our 54-acre Tewksbury apartment community boasts a sparkling clubhouse, private screening room with stadium seating, a premier fitness club, resort-style swimming pool, outdoor fireplace with seating, and premier resident services.', 'Located in prestigious Middlesex County and the greater Lowell area, Lodge at Ames Pond is located just off of I-495 and is minutes from I-93 and the best of Boston.', 'Enjoy convenient access to great shopping, dining, and work centers.', 'Come home to one of the oldest counties in Massachusetts, take in our serene views, and live well at the Lodge at Ames Pond.', 'Tour today!', 'We are currently offering self-guided tours.', 'Features:', 'Double vanities, XL washer and dryer closets, Track lighting, Arched entries, Refrigerator, FiOS and Comcast ready, Spacious master suites, Crown molding, Sunken tubs, Ceiling fans, Dishwasher, Full size washer and dryer, Central AC, Rounded corners and walls, Self cleaning oven, Large walk in closets, Pond views, Electric range, Two toned paint and accent walls, Private terrace and or balcony, Built in computer desk, Disposal, Upgraded kitchen appliances', 'Community Amenities:', 'Furnished apartments available, 24-hour package pickup, Built-in bookcase, Poolside grilling areas, Walk-in closet, Stainless steel appliances, Outdoor fireplace, Dual vanity, Nest thermostat, Built-in desk, Detached garages available, Washer and dryer, Smart home package, Patio/ balcony, Pet Friendly, FreeWeights, Build credit score with RentTrack, Theater room, Granite countertops, Salt water pool, Playground, Wood plank flooring, Closet built-ins, Sports lounge, Deposit free with Rhino, Soaking tub, Moving services with Move Matcher, Quartz countertops, State-of-the-art fitness club, Short term leases available, Gate, RecRoom, Pond view, Terrace, Business center, Outdoor kitchen, On-site storage available,', 'Clubhouse (Available for Rental), Tile backsplash, Resident app', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet friendly, some restrictions may apply.', 'Want more
